description: Introduction to Arabic language and Arabic-speaking culture with practice in all four language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Intended for students with no previous study of Arabic as well as heritage speakers.
fulldesc:
ARBC 1 First-Year Arabic
Introduction to Arabic language and Arabic-speaking culture with practice in all four language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Intended for students with no previous study of Arabic as well as heritage speakers.
Credits 5
Instructor The Staff
Quarter Offered Fall
